name: Mathew
coverLetter:
My name is Mat.
I live in iowa and am relocating to portland very soon...im looking to find work and housing before i come out there... i love weed and have always enjoyed working with it on my own and dreamed of having a job in cannibas industry...however im moving to portland because of an old friend mainly...but im an avid weed enthusiast....if you can help me or point me in the right direction that would be swell....im looking for a consistent future and am highly motivated... thank you for your time and consideration.
